title: Mahmoud Khalil, detained by feds, files $20M claim against Trump
shortDescription: Mahmoud Khalil alleges in the claim that the Trump-led government abused its power to falsely arrest, imprison and prosecute him.

title: Trump threatens 35% tariff for Canada, higher rate than other allies
shortDescription: Trump threatened Canada, one of the country's largest trading partners, with a 35% tariff starting Aug. 1.

title: Trump sues California over transgender girls in school sports
shortDescription:
The Trump administration claims the state’s policies allowing transgender girls to compete in girls’ school sports violate Title IX.

title: Judge blocks Trump birthright order again
shortDescription: A federal judge blocked President Donald Trump's birthright citizenship order, defying a recent SCOTUS ruling limiting nationwide injunctions.

title: Secret Service suspended 6 staff after Trump assassination attempt
shortDescription: The Secret Service suspended six staffers and adopted dozens of security changes in the aftermath of an assassination attempt on Trump a year ago.

title: Trump cuts Head Start, health care for immigrants
shortDescription: Public health advocates worry restricting care will hurt society while also raising insurance premiums to compensate.

title: Trump says he'll visit Texas flood site Friday: What to know
shortDescription: More than 100 people are dead after heavy rainfall overwhelmed a river in central Texas. Here's what we know about Trump's trip to the area.

title: Trump administration takes away one more weather forecasting tool
shortDescription: The decision by the Department of Defense to stop providing data to NOAA is just the latest challenge for the agency this year.

title: The Trump assassination attempt changed politics
shortDescription: The assassination attempt on President Donald Trump one year ago changed U.S. politics. Here's what we know now.

title: Judge blocks Trump's limit on birthright citizenship
shortDescription: A federal judge has again blocked President Trump’s executive order limiting birthright citizenship, despite a recent Supreme Court decision.

title: Biden's doctor won't testify in Congressional probe into his mental fitness
shortDescription: Joe Biden's physician refused to answer questions during a closed-door deposition in House Republicans' probe of his mental acuity as president.

title: Trump's birthright citizenship efforts blocked by judge's ruling
shortDescription: U.S. District Judge Joseph LaPlante said his decision was "not a close call."

title: As Trump pushes tariff deadline again, what does TACO mean?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has again delayed a tariff deadline. His back and forth on the policy spurred TACO accusations. What does it mean?

title: Big Beautiful Bill 101: What businesses are favored (or not) in law
shortDescription: The “Big Beautiful Bill" President Donald Trump signed into law sends billions to (and away from) U.S. businesses. Here are some of the winners.

title: Trump tax bill supercharges Coast Guard’s Arctic icebreaker fleet

title: Trump selects Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy as interim NASA head
shortDescription: Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy is about to perform double duty after President Donald Trump named him interim head of NASA.

title: Marco Rubio makes first visit to Asia as Trump tariffs loom
shortDescription: Secretary of State Marco Rubio met counterparts in Southeast Asia during his first visit to the region since taking office.

title: Rights advocates, Dems condemn lawmaker Randy Fine's comments as racist
shortDescription: Top Democrats and rights advocates criticized Rep. Randy Fine, calling comments he made about Rep. Ilhan Omar "racist" and "Islamophobic."

title: Trump's "Big Beautiful Bill" is now law: Who gains and who loses?

title: Trump's deputy chief of staff unloaded Trump Media stock the day before tariff announcement
shortDescription: Scavino and two other top officials sold Trump Media stock with a combined value of up to $10 million before tariffs news

title: Trump tax bill sends new icebreaker fleet into melting Arctic
shortDescription: Federal officials have long warned the Coast Guard needed new ships to patrol icy waters eyed by China.
